actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relative to nondiscrimination in public education.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no governmental or judicial authority shall prescribe attendance assignments in public schools on the basis of race or color. Gives Congress the power to enforce this article.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relative to nondiscrimination in public education.
